007package renderer.scene.util;
008
009import renderer.scene.Model;
010
011/**
012   A {@link Model} that implements {@code MeshMaker_TP}
013   can build its geometric mesh in any of three structures:
014   using horizontal triangle strips, vertical triangle
015   strips, or individual quads (each made up out of a
016   two triangle strip).
017*/
018public interface MeshMaker_TP extends MeshMaker
019{
020   /**
021      @return the {@link MeshType} that the {@link Model} contains
022   */
023   public MeshType getType();
024
025   /**
026      Build an instance of the {@link Model} with new values for the number
027      of lines of latitude and longitude while keeping all the other model
028      parameters the same.
029
030      @param n  number of lines of latitude for the returned {@link Model}
031      @param k  number of lines of longitude for the returned {@link Model}
032      @return a new instance of the {@link Model} with the updated parameters
033   */
034   default public Model remake(int n, int k)
035   {
036      return remake(n, k, MeshType.CHECKER);
037   }
038
039   /**
040      Build an instance of the {@link Model} with new values for the number
041      of lines of latitude and longitude while keeping all the other model
042      parameters the same.
043
044      @param n  number of lines of latitude for the returned {@link Model}
045      @param k  number of lines of longitude for the returned {@link Model}
046      @param type  the {@link MeshType} that the returned {@link Model} should contain
047      @return a new instance of the {@link Model} with the updated parameters and {@link MeshType}
048   */
049   public Model remake(int n, int k, MeshType type);
050}
